articles.description: Donald Trump lashed out at three black women journalists in the eyes of many within three days. Democratic strategist Tara Dowdell joins Joy Reid to discuss.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Karine Jean-Pierre: Because Democrats have flipped states we have different paths to 270 in 2020

articles.title: Elliot Williams: It's hard to find a serious attorney who will take attorney general job

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Gillum makes ‘Unapologetic call’ to count every vote
articles.description: Democratic Florida gubernatorial candidate Andrew Gillum holds a press conference as he awaits a recount in the tight Governor race. Gillum, the current mayor of Tallahassee says, “In America, we count every vote regardless of what the outcome may be.”

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Teresa Tomlinson: There have been broadscale questions of voter suppression in Georgia
articles.description: The Georgia midterm election for governor is still undecided, as votes continue to come in, and Democratic candidate Stacey Abrams has not conceded to Republican Jack Kemp, who leads by a slim margin. Joy Reid and her panel discuss.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Florida's Secretary of State orders recount for Senate and Governor races
articles.description: Florida Secretary of State has ordered a recount for the top three races in the state, Senate, Governor, and Agricultural Commissioner. Millions of votes will need to be recounted with the deadline on Thursday. NBC’s Ron Allen reports.

articles.title: Protests erupt in Broward County after officials trigger recount
